content:
[
  {
    "intentId": "NAI637910",
    "intentName": "NetworkAccessInquiry",
    "intent_description": "an inquiry or concern regarding accessing the Company Network or Virtual Private Network (VPN) and general inquiries regarding Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA), PingID, Single Sign On (SSO)- create a name for the intent.",
    "slots": [
      {
        "slotId": "INTy261",
        "slotName": "InquiryType",
        "slot_description": "Specifies the type of inquiry the user has regarding network access or authentication methods.",
        "type": "String ",
        "possible_Values": [
          "CompanyNetwork",
          "VPN",
          "MFA",
          "PingID",
          "SSO"
        ]
      },
      {
        "slotId": "SpCon328",
        "slotName": "SpecificConcern",
        "slot_description": "Identifies the specific concern or issue the user is facing within the chosen inquiry type",
        "type": "String ",
        "possible_Values": [
          "ConnectionIssue",
          "LoginProblem",
          "MFASetup",
          "PingIDQuery",
          "SSOConfiguration"
        ]
      },
      {
        "slotId": "DevT241",
        "slotName": "DeviceType",
        "slot_description": "Specifies the type of device the user is using when accessing the network or authentication methods.",
        "type": "String ",
        "possible_Values": [
          "Desktop",
          "Laptop",
          "Mobile Phone"
        ]
      }
    ]
  },
  {
    "intentId": "RTEsc5610",
    "intentName": "RequestTicketEscalation",
    "intent_description": "User needs to escalate or raise the priority of an existing IT incident ticket",
    "slots": [
      {
        "slotId": "TNumS4621",
        "slotName": "TicketNumber",
        "slot_description": "the unique identification number of the IT incident ticket that the user wants to escalate.",
        "type": "String ",
        "possible_Values": [
          "Project Code + Numeric Ticket Number",
          "Alphanumeric Ticket Number"
        ]
      },
      {
        "slotId": "PLev2016",
        "slotName": "PriorityLevel",
        "slot_description": "the desired priority level to which the user wants to escalate the IT incident ticket",
        "type": "String ",
        "possible_Values": [
          "Low",
          "Medium",
          "High",
          "Critical"
        ]
      },
      {
        "slotId": "TSDat006",
        "slotName": "TicketSubmittingDate",
        "slot_description": "Date when the initial ticket was submitted",
        "type": "String ",
        "possibleValues": [
          "dd-mm-yyyy",
          "yyyy-dd-mm",
          "mm-dd-yyyy",
          "yyyy-mm-dd"
        ]
      }
    ]
  },
  {
    "intentId": "CIq57930",
    "intentName": "ConcurInquiry",
    "intentDescription": "User has an inquiry or concern about the Concur system. ",
    "slots": [
      {
        "slotId": "InT739049",
        "slotName": "InquiryType",
        "slot_description": "Specifies the type of inquiry or concern the user has within the Concur system.",
        "type": "String ",
        "possible_Values": [
          "SystemConcern",
          "TravelExpensing",
          "BusinessPurchases",
          "TravelBooking",
          "ExpenseReports"
        ]
      },
      {
        "slotId": "EXCat4792",
        "slotName": "ExpenseCategory",
        "slot_description": "specifies the relevant category related to expensing travel costs or business purchase..",
        "type": "String ",
        "possible_Values": [
          "TravelCosts",
          "BusinessPurchases"
        ]
      },
      {
        "slotId": "TrBo00023",
        "slotName": "TravelBooking",
        "slot_description": " specifies the type of travel being booked, if the inquiry involves booking business travel ",
        "type": "String ",
        "possible_Values": [
          "Flight",
          "Hotel",
          "CarRental",
          "Other"
        ]
      },
      {
        "slotId": "CSIss1839",
        "slotName": "ConcurSystemIssue",
        "slot_description": "specifies the type of the issue encountered while using the Concur platform ",
        "type": "String "
      }
    ]
  },
  {
    "intentId": "REqLIn12",
    "intentName": "RequestLeaveInformation",
    "intent_description": "User has questions about or wants to request some sort of leave ",
    "slots": [
      {
        "slotId": "LT63710",
        "slotName": "leaveType",
        "slot_description": "Type of leave the information was requested about.",
        "type": "String ",
        "possible_Values": [
          "PTO",
          "TimeOff",
          "VacationBalance",
          "ParentalLeave",
          "JuryDuty",
          "MilitaryDuty",
          "LOA",
          "LeaveOfAbsence"
        ]
      },
      {
        "slotId": "LSDa6429",
        "slotName": "LeaveStartDate",
        "slot_description": "Starting date of the requested leave",
        "type": "String ",
        "possible_Values": [
          "dd-mm-yyyy",
          "yyyy-dd-mm",
          "mm-dd-yyyy",
          "yyyy-mm-dd"
        ]
      },
      {
        "slotId": "LEDa60191",
        "slotName": "LeaveEndDate",
        "slot_description": "Ending date of the requested leave",
        "type": "String ",
        "possible_Values": [
          "dd-mm-yyyy",
          "yyyy-dd-mm",
          "mm-dd-yyyy",
          "yyyy-mm-dd"
        ]
      },
      {
        "slotId": "ReasL3891",
        "slotName": "ReasonleaveType",
        "slot_description": "Captures the reason or purpose for requesting the leave",
        "type": "Sring "
      }
    ]
  }
]

You are provided with a list of the intents in json format. Each intent has its definition and corresponding slots. Each intent also has a unique ID associated with it in alphanumeric format.  Slots are values that need to be retrieved for a particular intent. If multiple slots are provided, fill all the slots.  If a slot value is not provided, set the value of the slot to "none".

Below you'll be provided with the utterance and your task to find the intent from the list above that best matches the utterance.
 Furthermore, please find and extract all entities available in the utterance. Very Important to note, that the utterance should match precisely all details in the description of the intent and slots. If any deviations present, do not extract slot values. 
Return your answer in a json format. The JSON should always have a key “output”.  The value of “output” should be a dictionary where the key of this dictionary is the intent id and the values is a subdictionary where the keys are the slot ids associated with the given intent and the values are the slot values.


I'm experiencing persistent issues with connecting to the corporate VPN today preventing secure access to the company network and resources.
